com.samsung.android.sdk.pen

Interface SpenSettingViewInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SpenMultiView, SpenSimpleView, SpenSurfaceView, SpenView

    public interface SpenSettingViewInterface

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  SpenSettingViewInterface.SpenBackgroundColorChangeListener
      The listener interface for callbacks that are called about the events of background color to SpenPageDoc is changed, if the transparent or semi-transparent background color to SpenPageDoc that is set to view, it returns false, if opacity, it returns true;

      • setToolTypeAction

        void setToolTypeAction(int toolType,
                     int action)
        Set the specified action for the specified tool type.
        Parameters:
        toolType - toolType of motion event TOOL_UNKNOWN, TOOL_FINGER, TOOL_SPEN, TOOL_MOUSE, TOOL_ERASER
        action - action of tool ACTION_NONE, ACTION_GESTURE, ACTION_STROKE, ACTION_ERASER, ACTION_STROKE_REMOVER, ACTION_COLOR_PICKER, ACTION_SELECTION

      • getToolTypeAction

        int getToolTypeAction(int toolType)
        Get the action of the specified tool type.
        Parameters:
        toolType - toolType of motion event TOOL_UNKNOWN, TOOL_FINGER, TOOL_SPEN, TOOL_MOUSE, TOOL_ERASER
        Returns:
        current action of tool ACTION_NONE, ACTION_GESTURE, ACTION_STROKE, ACTION_ERASER, ACTION_STROKE_REMOVER, ACTION_COLOR_PICKER, ACTION_SELECTION
